sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Login.css"; export default function Login() { const [isSigninActive, setIsSigninActive] = useState(true); const [isSignupSuccess, setIsSignupSuccess] = useState(false); const toggleForms = () => { setIsSigninActive(!isSigninActive); setIsSignupSuccess(false); // Reset signup success state when switching back to login }; const handleSignupSuccess = () => { setIsSignupSuccess(true); // Automatically switch to the login form after signup setTimeout(() => { setIsSigninActive(true); }, 2000); // Adjust time as needed for user experience }; return (
{!isSignupSuccess ? ( <> {isSigninActive ? (

Sign In

) : (

Sign Up

)} ) : (

Signup successful! Redirecting to login...

)}
Forgot your password?
); }
